title: Entitled User- Hero MLBN Content
custom_steps:
WHEN there is MLBN content in the hero
AND the user selects the content
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to play back the content

title: Entitled User- Games Carousel MLBN Content
custom_steps:
WHEN there is MLBN content in the games carousel
AND the user selects the content
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to play back the content

title: Entitled User- MLBN Content in VOD/SVOD carousel
custom_steps:
WHEN there is MLBN content in the VOD/SVOD carousel
AND the user selects the content
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to play back the content

title: MLBN un-entitled user
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user not entitled to MLBN content

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user lands on the Watch page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN MLBN content is not displayed in the hero or games carousel

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects MLBN content from a VOD/SVOD carousel (note this is live MLBN content, not clips from MLBN shows)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is presented with the Upgrade modal

title: MLBN content appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user
AND MLBN content is available

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is entitled to MLBN content
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN no lock icon is displayed on MLBN content
THEN a lock icon is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user observes the MLBN content
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a LIVE badge can be observed
AND no duration (time signature) is present
